TopicTitle: 1.12 additional launch sites unlocked by default in old carreer mode save.

Articles.Content: The 1.12 update added some additional launch sites that should only be available if you have discovered them first. My carreer mode save file that I made prior to the update has all the launch sites already unlocked and available. Which kinda ruins the fun of discovering them yourself. Is there a way to hide them in the VAB untill discovered? I already looked in the save file and cheat menus but I couldn't find anything useful.

If you've ever flown a spacecraft within a certain area of the location of the launchsite then I think the game automatically unlocks it, but I'm not entirely sure since I don't play Career mode, only Science mode
